comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: The yacht Oneida was owned by E.C. Benedict, a banker and Commodore of the Seawanhaka-Corinthian Yacht Club. See NYT of January 9, 1895 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9501E7D8163CE433A... These will be her crew.

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
